awd_titl_txt: The Second Institute for Fundamental Theory Workshop        "Yukawa Couplings and the Origins of Mass"; Gainesville,    Florida; February 11-13, 1994
awd_abstract_narration: 9400701  Ramond   A physics workshop on "Yukawa Couplings and the Origins of Mass" will be held February 11-13, 1994 at the University of Florida.  The workshop will address the question of the origin and the observed pattern of the masses of the elementary particles.  The question is a great puzzle, and discussion among experts, which the workshop is designed to encourage is very important.  ***                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                   !         !
